pages.text: The $(mob)Chicken$() is an animal commonly found in the $(thing)Overworld$(). It flees when hit and can be bred using $(item)Seeds$().$(p)It is a good source of food and various other materials. See the next pages for details on them.
$(mob)Chickens$() drop $(item)Feather$() on death. These are mostly used to craft $(item)Arrows$().

$(mob)Chickens$() also lay $(item)Eggs$() every few minutes. These can be used to make food like $(item)Pumpkin Pie$() or launched. Launched $(item)Eggs$() have a chance of spawning a baby $(mob)Chicken$() on impact.
